title: Keeping Community at the Heart of the Community Reinvestment Act
content: For release on delivery  9:15 a.m. EDT  May 18, 2018      Keeping Community at the Heart of the Community Reinvestment Act         Remarks by     Lael Brainard     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the       Association of Neighborhood and Housing Development   Eighth Annual Community Development Conference   Build.Community.Power     New York, New York    May 18, 2018
